title: 求1.12.2得各种mod
author: Zrulerc
txt_content:
求1.12.2的各种mod
匠魂，幸运方块，等价交换，小地图，矿物加强，拔刀剑，暮色什么的，越多越好
前置mod也请一并发送
万分感谢

replies.author: 1093751150sen
replies.txt_content:
匠魂https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tinkers-construct
匠魂前置https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mantle
旅行地图https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/journeymap
幸运方块http://www.minecraftascending.co ... block_download.html
拔刀剑https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/slashblade
等价转换https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/projecte

打包链接（不含幸运方块）https://c-t.work/s/9abeb8b28df841

replies.author: 小诸葛1
replies.txt_content: [1.12.X索引]综合模组索引v2.3（当前数量402） https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-774945-1-1.html (出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)，这里有几乎所有的mod
